#summary errorMessageOn(objectName, property [prependText, appendText, wrapperElement])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing the error message if the [ObjectValidation object validation] fails.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The name of the object (model name) to display the error message for ||
|| * property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to display the error message for ||
|| * prependText* || string || false || || Value to prepend to the error message ||
|| * appendText* || string || false || || Value to append to the error message ||
|| * wrapperElement* || string || false || div || Name of the HTML tag to wrap the error message in ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#checkBox(objectName="photo", property="isPublic", label="Is public?")# <br />
     #errorMessageOn(objectName="photo", property="isPublic")#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
